title: Integration Function Block
description: This function block performs numerical integration based on the input value and a factor. It updates the output based on a simple trapezoidal rule integration method and incorporates system time.
name: INTEGRATE

input.name: E
input.description: Enable flag to execute the integration calculation. Default is TRUE.

input.name: X
input.description: The current value to be integrated.

input.name: K
input.description: Scaling factor for the integration calculation. Default value is 1.0.
